original_text: The apostles went away from the meeting of the Jewish leaders. They were very happy because they thought to themselves, ‘These leaders have done bad things to us because we obey Jesus. That shows that God accepts us as his people.’
korean_text: 사도들은 그 이름을 위하여 능욕 받는 일에 합당한 자로 여기심을 기뻐하면서 공회 앞을 떠나니라

sentences.original_text: from the meeting of the Jewish leaders
These leaders have done bad things to us
sentences.korean_translation: 이 지도자들이 우리에게 나쁜 일을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: That shows that God accepts us
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 우리를 받아들이신다는 것을 보여줍니다
